text: Burlington Airpark is an airport in Burlington, Ontario, Canada. It has two runways. The airport is privately owned by Vince Rossi. ==History== The airport was created by Victor and Gwen Kovachik in 1962. It is a very popular airport for Toronto-area pilots. ==Runways== The airport's first runway is and is made of asphalt and turf. The second runway is and is made of turf. ==References== ==Other websites== * Burlington Airpark Website * Kovachik Airport Services Category:1962 establishments in Canada Category:Airports in Canada Category:Transport in Ontario
title: Burlington Airpark
